data.title: We Need More Law And Order: Crime Drama Movies Airing In November
data.meta_description: Recently the Republican nominee for president mentioned the need for more law and order. We at Channel Guide Magazine couldn’t agree more. Law & Order was a great show. Phenomenal show! All joking aside, “Crime Drama” is a great genre. Click here to find out when Law & Order airs and a complete list TV Crime Series. Feel more like watching a movie? November is packed with crime drama movies. I’m setting my DVR for The Departed (pictured above) on TNT, Goodfellas on AMC, and Mystic River and No Country For Old Men on IFC. Below is a complete list of crime [...]
data.text:
Recently the Republican nominee for president mentioned the need for more law and order. We at Channel Guide Magazine couldn’t agree more. Law & Order was a great show. Phenomenal show! All joking aside, “Crime Drama” is a great genre.

Click here to find out when Law & Order airs and a complete list TV Crime Series.

Feel more like watching a movie? November is packed with crime drama movies. I’m setting my DVR for The Departed (pictured above) on TNT, Goodfellas on AMC, and Mystic River and No Country For Old Men on IFC. Below is a complete list of crime drama movies airing in November. All times Eastern.

What are your favorite crime drama movies?

The Alphabet Killer (2008) Former cop Megan Price investigates a murder similar to one that drove her crazy. Eliza Dushku, Cary Elwes, Timothy Hutton, Tom Malloy.

IndiePLEX Nov. 2 3:25a; 19 6:10a

ALPHA DOG (2006) A teenage dealer and his friends kidnap the impressionable younger brother of a junkie who won’t pay for the drugs. Bruce Willis, Emile Hirsch, Justin Timberlake, Ben Foster. (R)

TMC Nov. 3 10p; 9 8p; 12 7p; 20 7p; 29 2:30a

TMC Xtra Nov. 5 8p; 8 11:45p; 15 3a; 19 3:30a; 23 9:45p; 27 6p

Showtime Extreme Nov. 1 6p

American Gangster (2007) A Harlem mobster combines ingenuity and strict business codes to dominate organized crime, while a veteran cop searches for a way to bring him down. Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Cuba Gooding Jr. (R)

HBO2 Nov. 5 12:30a; 13 1:30p

HBO Zone Nov. 2 6:35a; 11 5:50p; 21 7:20p; 24 2:55a

BAD LIEUTENANT (1992) The case of a raped nun gets to a profane New York detective fouled by drugs, alcohol and sex. Harvey Keitel, Frankie Thorn, Zoë Lund, Anthony Ruggiero. (R)

SundanceTV Nov. 10 1p

Badlands (1973) A thrill-seeking teenage girl joins a garbage man on a South Dakota killing spree. Martin Sheen, Sissy Spacek, Warren Oates, Ramon Bieri. (PG)

TCM Nov. 5 10:15p

The Big Clock (1948) A crime-magazine publisher kills his mistress, then orders his editor to lead a manhunt. Ray Milland, Charles Laughton, Maureen O’Sullivan, George Macready.

TCM Nov. 29 11:30p

Black Mass (2015) Forming an alliance with FBI agent John Connolly in 1970s Boston, Irish gangster James “Whitey” Bulger increases his power and evades capture to become one of the most dangerous criminals in U.S. history. Johnny Depp, Joel Edgerton, Benedict Cumberbatch, Dakota Johnson. (R)

HBO Nov. 2 12:30a; 10 4:10a; 30 8p

IFC Nov. 10 6:15a, 2p

AMC Nov. 17 9a
